scripts.test:browser-mocked-fa-api-legacy-cdn-al: for browser in chrome webkit firefox; do npx playwright test --project=mock-fa-api-legacy-cdn-$browser; done
scripts.test:browser-mocked-fa-api-pro-kit-all-b: for browser in chrome webkit firefox; do npx playwright test --project=mock-fa-api-pro-kit-$browser; done
scripts.test:browser-real-fa-api-legacy-cdn-all-: for browser in chrome webkit firefox; do npx playwright test --project=real-fa-api-legacy-cdn-chrome; done
scripts.test:browser-real-fa-api-pro-kit-all-bro: for browser in chrome webkit firefox; do npx playwright test --project=real-fa-api-pro-kit-$browser; done
